department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Collective Military Training role playing and facilities
description:
Trade Agreement: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK
tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid
Competitive Procurement Strategy: Subsequent/Follow-on Contracts
Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No
Nature of Requirements:

Collective Military Training role playing and facilities

W6399-21J415/C
Choquette, Herb
Telephone No. - (613) 449-8446

DND requires contractors to provide facilities, equipment and personnel to support one, or a combination, of the following key categories to facilitate and enable its collective training events within Canada and the USA:

Category 1: Land Exercise Effects
Category 2: Specialized facilities, platforms, and equipment
Category 3: Aviation Exercise Effects
Category 4: Marine Exercise Effects
Category 5: Cyber Exercise Effects
Category 6: Exercise support
Category 7: Subject matter experts

This Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA) is to pre-qualify bidders to bid on Requests for Proposals (RFPs) for Collective Training events, which combine multiple categories or subcategories of training, simulations, role playing and facilities that are included in the RFSA.]),
